  • Já a Meta, que controla o Faceb… [+3174 chars]" }, { "source": { "id": null, "name": "Unwire.hk" }, "author": "Harold", "title": "Meta 元宇宙加入4 呎「社交距離」 防 VR 性騷擾再現 - UNWIRE.HK", "description": "Facebook 母公司 Meta 在周五宣布，將為 Horizo​​n Worlds 和 Horizo​​n Venues 引入社交距離，新增「個人邊界」。用户之間將有 2 呎的「個人邊界」，即每人之間有 4 呎距離，比現實社交距離還遠。Meta 稱可防止用家再受性騷擾。 ▲ 4 呎個人邊界", "url": "https://unwire.hk/2022/02/08/meta-3/fun-tech/", "urlToImage": "https://cdn.unwire.hk/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/meta-01-1.png", "publishedAt": "2022-02-08T06:06:53Z", "content": "Facebook Meta Horizon Worlds Horizon Venues 2 4 Meta \r\n4 \r\nMeta Vivek Sharma Horizon Worlds Horizon Venues Personal Boundary 4 \r\nMeta \r\nSlash Gear\r\n—\r\nunwire.hk Mewe https://mewe.com/p/unwirehk" }, { "source": { "id": "google-news", "name": "Google News" }, "author": null, "title": "Facebook s’effondre en Bourse : ce qu’il faut savoir sur le rôle d’Apple - Ouest-France", "description": null, "url": "https://news.google.com/__i/rss/rd/articles/CBMimgFodHRwczovL3d3dy5vdWVzdC1mcmFuY2UuZnIvaGlnaC10ZWNoL2ZhY2Vib29rL2ZhY2Vib29rLXMtZWZmb25kcmUtZW4tYm91cnNlLWNlLXF1LWlsLWZhdXQtc2F2b2lyLXN1ci1sZS1yb2xlLWQtYXBwbGUtZGU4OGYyMjgtODdlZS0xMWVjLTkzN2UtODNhZjM0OWU1MWFk0gEA?oc=5", "urlToImage": null, "publishedAt": "2022-02-08T06:00:58Z", "content": null }, { "source": { "id": "independent", "name": "Independent" }, "author": "Andrew Griffin", "title": "Meta could shut down Facebook and Instagram in Europe - Yahoo", "description": "Meta might have to shut down Facebook and Instagram in Europe, it has said. The Irish Times", "description": "Threat is outlined in technology company’s annual report", "url": "https://www.irishtimes.com/business/technology/meta-again-threatens-to-pull-facebook-and-instagram-from-europe-1.4796214", "urlToImage": "https://www.irishtimes.com/image-creator/?id=1.4796212&origw=1440", "publishedAt": "2022-02-07T19:17:00Z", "content": "Meta Platforms has once again threatened to pull Facebook and Instagram from Europe if it is unable to keep transferring user data back to the United States, amid negotiations between regulators to r… [+3859 chars]" } ] constructor(){ super(); console.log("Hii I am a constructor"); this.state={ articles: this.articles } } render() { return ( <>
